name: Back to iBumi
description:
>Use arrow keys to move. Its a "Vertical shooter" shmup wannabe...all the way   upwards

>There are 5 stages,  the 5th stage has 2 endings like 'Choose-your-own adventure-        game'... simplified.

> ...with a short sci-fi storyline (with some tiny Easter eggs if you into shmup,90s            anime  and scifi series)

>Tq fr reading 'Back to iBumi'short scifi zine...

> #shikasketchbook   #stellanovatransnita
